Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Insurall Insurance is an independent insurance agency representing many insurance companies. We’ve been serving Birmingham, Bessemer, Midfield, Fairfield and other areas since 1974, and we have a very knowledgeable staff with a combined 75 years experience!  We specialize in cancelled, declined & difficult to place insurance, but we also welcome preferred business–representing fine national companies such as Progressive, GMAC & Foremost.  We handle auto insurance, home insurance for homeowners and renters, as well as insurance for mobile homes, boats, motorcycles, RVs, and light commercial vehicles.  Prior coverage is not required. our very courteous staff is willing to give help and advice. We can handle the youngest drivers to the senior citizens.  We are conveniently located in the Midfield Shopping Plaza with plenty of free parking. Come by and see why thousands of clients have relied on our company for 37 years!

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Street Address: 300 Richard Arrington Jr Blvd N Ste 310
Business Information: Wicker Agency is here for all the unforeseeable events that may happen in life. Whether you are caught in a fender-bender on the freeway or your home gets an unexpected leak we can assist. In situations like this, can rely on our insurance policies to protect you.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Street Address: 300 Richard Arrington Jr Blvd N Ste 310
Business Information: Wicker Agency is here for all the unforeseeable events that may happen in life. Whether you are caught in a fender-bender on the freeway or your home gets an unexpected leak we can assist. In situations like this, can rely on our insurance policies to protect you.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Street Address: 300 Richard Arrington Jr Blvd N Ste 310
Business Information: Wicker Agency is here for all the unforeseeable events that may happen in life. Whether you are caught in a fender-bender on the freeway or your home gets an unexpected leak we can assist. In situations like this, can rely on our insurance policies to protect you.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

At Direct, we believe in second chances and welcome all drivers to apply for car insurance, even those considered “high risk” or who need an SR22 or FR44. Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.
